name: Shifter (Eric Yachbes)
description:
A simple side-scrolling platformer that allows the player to shift into different abilities, helping them overcome challenges in a level that cannot be done with simple jumping and walking.

CONTROLS:

W - JUMP
A/S - LEFT / RIGHT
SHIFT - Enter Shift Mode
SHIFT + A - Archer (Up and down arrow keys to shoot)
SHIFT + D - Dash
